title: Ocean Animals
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 380 words, Level J (Grade 1), Lexile 490L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     M and P
description: Within the vast ocean, there exist many fascinating creatures. Ocean Animals provides students with an entertaining and detailed glimpse into this ocean community. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine the main idea and supporting details and to effectively ask and answer questions. The books and lesson are available for levels M and P.
reviewWords: community, endangered, lobes, mammals, pollution, reptiles
comprehension: Main Idea and Details                : Determine main idea and supporting details
awareness: Consonant Digraph Sounds                : Discriminate consonant digraph /sh/ sound
wordWork: Alphabetical Order                : Place words in alphabetical order
